title: Panshet Lake Side Camping
details: Looking for a chilling and rocking weekend come join us for thrilling experience .Cool breeze and a tent beside you with your friends and a bonfire to make it special evening and karaoke and ghost stories

itinerary.description: 06:30 PM : Enjoy the camp night with your friends & love ones.
07:00 PM : Prepare for a night under the sky, play a few games, share stories (especially your ghost stories), make new friends and enjoy the campfire and lot more
10:30 PM : Dinner and enjoy the winters with bonfire
01:00 AM : Off to sleep ( who are sleepy)
08:00 AM Wake up call, get refreshed by a hot cup of tea & beautiful sunrise.
09:00 AM : Move towards lakeside, those who would like to do. Others can enjoy their morning at Campsite.
11:00 AM : Check out from the campsite nomad!!! Back to city life.

camp_event_details.baseVillageCamp: Pawana Dam Tal. Maval Dis. Pune

costInclude.item: Adventure activities (Archery, Dart Game,Cricket, Football , Badminton, Carom, volleyball & More.

costExclude.item: Any tea/breakfast expenses you take over the travel breaks

thingsToCarry.item: Good shoes, extra pair of socks.
A bottle of water (at least 1 Ltrs)
Some are ready to eat food. cakes,lays, Biscuits, etc.
Pleases do not carry sling bags
Please avoid wearing Gold and other orna

faqs.question: Is drinking and smoking allowed?
faqs.answer: We donâ€™t encourage campers for such activities. It is allowed but please note you should carry your own items and will be liable to take the responsibility for any kind of damage caused during the activity.

faqs.question: Is Jain food available?
faqs.answer: Yes, it is available but one needs to contact us in advance while booking to check the availability of the same.

faqs.question: Is this camping available for couples and families?
faqs.answer: Yes, we invite couples and families along with childrens for camping to have a friendly and memorable event with us.

faqs.question: Is transportation available for camping?
faqs.answer: No, transportation is not included. We can arrange for the same if required by customers for a large group with some extra charges. Please contact our customer care for more details.

faqs.question: Can I cancel my booking?
faqs.answer: Cancellation is allowed only before 2 days of the event. Please note there is no refund if you cancel 1 day prior to the event.

faqs.question: Is the camp safe for carrying pricey items?
faqs.answer: We recommend not to carry expensive and heavy materials. Please take care of your own belongings as we are not responsible for the same.

faqs.question: Do you have separate washrooms?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide separate washrooms for both (male and female).

faqs.question: Are washrooms available on the trek?
faqs.answer: Washrooms are available at the base village only. No facility is available during the trek.

faqs.question: Is there anything we should remember while joining the event ?
faqs.answer: Please carry your personal ID cards with you while coming for the event. And avoid heavy backpacks.
